Hello,

VaporNode is a dedicated server, and now cloud, provider with employees that have been involved in the hosting and IT industry for a combined 7 years. We plan to bring our expertise to VaporNode to grow it into one of the definitive hosting providers in Chicago. The below offers consist of hardware located within Steadfast Networks' downtown facility.

**Advantages:**

- Central Chicago location

- Local SSD storage

- Live, automatic weekly backups to SAN

- True hardware isolation - KVM virtualization platform

- Free local DDoS protection, less than 2ms additional latency

- IPv6 enabled


**New service special!**
We are giving away 3x VPR-C2 plans that are free for the first month. Consecutive months will be discounted to $6/month. Be quick and pick one up here: [click](https://portal.vapornode.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=22)


**VPR-C1:**

CPU: 1 core @ 3.2GHz+

RAM: 256MB DDR3 ECC

Storage: 5GB SSD space

Network: 500GB bandwidth @ 1Gbps

IP Space: 1 IPv4 / IPv6 on request

Features: 4Gbps DDoS protection; automatic weekly backups; metro Chicago facility; instant setup

[Order here @ 3.75/month](https://portal.vapornode.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=16)


**VPR-C2:**

CPU: 2 core @ 3.2GHz+

RAM: 512MB DDR3 ECC

Storage: 10GB SSD space

Network: 750GB bandwidth @ 1Gbps

IP Space: 1 IPv4 / IPv6 on request

Features: 4Gbps DDoS protection; automatic weekly backups; metro Chicago facility; instant setup

[Order here @ 6.00/month](https://portal.vapornode.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=24)



Upon ordering you are able to choose from many different ISO images to mount to the VM. These include CentOS, Ubuntu, Fedora, FreeBSD, Debian, and Windows Server (requires 10GB+ disk space). These services are automatically setup but require manual OS installation via our integrated console. Additional IPv4 addresses are priced at $2/month per IP.


These are unmanaged services with no optional management option at checkout.


Not Allowed: IRC, Bittorrent, TOR, P2P, warez, spamming

Full ToS: https://vapornode.com/terms-of-service

More information and additional plans: https://vapornode.com/cloud


Looking glass: http://lg.vapornode.com


Payment: We currently accept PayPal, credits cards, and debit cards. No refunds are permitted on cloud services at this time.


Thanks for looking!
